articles.title: Patriots will have a ‘road warrior’ for Super Bowl LX in defensive coordinator Terrell Williams

articles.title: Joe Mazzulla: Jayson Tatum has had ‘zero setback’ in his Achilles rehab

articles.title: Drake Maye, limited at Patriots practice, says his shoulder is ‘just fine’
articles.description:

articles.title: Ben Brown is heading to the Super Bowl 59 years after his grandfather played in the first one
articles.description:
Allen Brown was a member of the Green Bay Packers' Suepr Bowl I and II championship teams. Now, grandson Ben gets to play in Super Bowl LX with the Patriots.

The post Ben Brown is heading to the Super Bowl 59 years after his grandfather played in the first one appeared first on Boston.com.
